import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Star, Minus, Plus, ShoppingCart } from 'lucide-react'; import placeholder from '../assets/placeholder.svg'; const product = { id: 1, name: 'Traditional A2 Cow Ghee', price: 29.99, description: `Our premium Traditional A2 Cow Ghee is made using the ancient Bilona method. Rich in flavor and packed with nutrients, it's perfect for cooking, spreading, or as a healthy addition to your daily diet.`, image: placeholder, rating: 4.8, reviews: 128, }; const relatedProducts = [ { id: 2, name: 'Herbal Ghee', price: 24.99, image: placeholder }, { id: 3, name: 'Organic Honey', price: 15.99, image: placeholder }, { id: 4, name: 'Coconut Oil', price: 12.99, image: placeholder }, ]; export default function ProductDetails() { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); return (
{/* Product Image */}
